function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of environmental protection leading to the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health crises","Mitigation":"Implementation of public health measures and environmental regulations","Technologies":"Public health surveillance systems, air and water quality monitoring technologies","People":"General population, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Social inequality and poverty contributing to disease transmission","Impact":"Higher vulnerability to contagious diseases and slower disease containment","Mitigation":"Poverty reduction, access to healthcare, and education programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote education platforms","People":"Underprivileged communities, marginalized populations","Owner":"NGOs, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inefficient use of ecological resources leading to environmental degradation","Impact":"Loss of biodiversity and disruption of ecosystems, increasing disease vectors and environmental health risks","Mitigation":"Sustainable resource management, conservation efforts, and habitat restoration","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, wildlife tracking technologies","People":"Ecological researchers, conservation organizations","Owner":"Environmental agencies, research institutions"}]}
